trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" />, which can include shapes, text, video, images, or other drawings.
trans-unit.target: 繪製內含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 的區域，可包含圖形、文字、視訊、影像或其他繪圖。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows shapes and text that were painted with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示圖形和文字與已繪製<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush>。

trans-unit.source: ![DrawingBrush output examples](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-drawingbrushexamples.png "DrawingBrush output examples")
trans-unit.target: ![DrawingBrush 輸出範例](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-drawingbrushexamples.png "DrawingBrush 輸出範例")

trans-unit.source: Shapes and text painted with a drawing brush
trans-unit.target: 使用繪圖筆刷繪製的圖形和文字

trans-unit.source: For more information and examples, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[使用映像、 繪圖和視覺效果繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The resulting brush has no content.
trans-unit.target: 產生的筆刷沒有任何內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> that describes the contents of the brush.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 會描述筆刷的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> class that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化包含指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> that describes the contents of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> ，描述此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> that describes the contents of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 描述此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush" /> 內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 預設為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing" /> 相依性屬性。
